channel.title: Jupyter on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in Jupyter on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site

item.title: Jupyter
item.description: 在jupter 中显示进度 import pandas as pd from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # 假设 parseHtml 已经定义 # 在 Jupyter Notebook 中使用 tqdm 需要引入特定的模块 from tqdm.notebook import tqdm # 假设 df 是你的 DataFrame for index, row in tqdm(df.iterrows(), total=df.shape[0]): word = row["Word"] print("--------------------") print(word) for ele in parseHtml(word): # 从 ele 中查找子元素 if ele.parent.parent.parent.find('span', class_='pos dpos') is not None: print("-------------------- ") print(ele) print(ele.parent.parent.parent.find('span', class_='pos dpos').text) else: print("None found.") IProgress not found Question IProgress not found.
